config_notify_agent_assigned_description: Notify Omnichannel user (customer) when a new agent is assigned to the room.
config_notify_room_transferred_descripti: Notify Omnichannel user (customer) when room is transferred.
config_message_add_agent_name_descriptio: In the first message of a sequence of messages from the attendant, add your name before the text to inform who the conversation is with.
